text:
"Shining Force III" is a series of fantasy role-playing video games. It was made by Sonic! Software Planning and published by Sega for the Sega Saturn in 1997.
List of video games.
Only the first episode was released in North America and Europe. There is also a bonus game called "Shining Force III Premium Disc"; it was only released in Japan, as well as "Scenario 2" and "Scenario 3".
